title.native: 俺を好きなのはお前だけかよ
title.romaji: Ore wo Suki nano wa Omae dake ka yo
title.english: ORESUKI: Are you the only one who loves me?

description: Amatsuyu "Joro" Kisaragi finds himself in a rather delightful situation, two lovely girls asked him out on a date in the same week. Little does he know he's not the actual target of their love, instead, he ends up as a love consultant forced to juggle a web of relationships more complex than initially thought.
synonyms: อุตส่าห์มีคนมาชอบทั้งที ทำไมต้องเป็นยัยนี่ด้วยนะ

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Baseball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of baseball.

title.native: 俺を好きなのはお前だけかよ
俺を好きなのはお前だけかよ

node.description: Started off as a composite artist.

[Website](https://www.saitoshuka.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Saito_Shuka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/08saito_shuka16) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/shuka-saito/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNZixANYOD3NyepS2lsAArg)

A Japanese voice actress and singer currently affiliated with Holy Peak. Known for her role as You Watanabe in the multimedia franchise Love Live! Sunshine!!. Also works as a school idol for group Aqours, for the same franchise. In 2019, she made her solo debut as a musician under Sacra Music with the mini album "Kutsuhimo" (くつひも, Kutsuhimo). Later that year, she released the single "36℃/Papapa" (36℃/パパパ); the song "Papapa" was used as the opening theme to the anime series Oresuki.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Cerberus - Memento Mori (VG)

__Agency:__ Toy's Factory

[ToysFactory Profile](https://www.toysfactory.co.jp/artist/harukashiraishi/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/shiraishi-haruka/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shiraharu48?s=09)

Haruka Shiraishi is a Japanese actress and voice actress. She was previously affiliated with Hirata Office, but is currently affiliated with Toy's Factory.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Rupee - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Folkwang - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Blücher - Azur Lane
- Agano - Azur Lane
- Le Malin - Azur Lane
- Erina - Tevi (VG)
- Grace Howard - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Height:__ 165 cm

[Website](https://www.tomatsuharuka.com/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/tomatsuharuka-blog)

Tomatsu debuted in 2007, starring in Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica as Corticarte Apa Lagranges. Since then, she has had other major roles such as Lala Satalin Deviluke in To Love-Ru and Shiho Sannomiya in Zettai Karen Children. Before graduating from high school in 2008, she used to live in Ichimomiya city where she often took the shinkansen, traveling back and forth between Nagoya and Tokyo to attend recordings. On January 11, 2019, she married a man from outside the entertainment industry.

One of the members of the voice actress unit [Sphere](https://anilist.co/staff/103636).

__Non-anime roles:__
- Mary - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

Sachika's voice acting career began after winning the "KADOKAWA×UP-FRONT STYLE Idol Seiyuu Audition 2008" competition in February 2009. She debuted by voicing Yuri Gamagori in the anime Shangri-La.

Sachika's hobbies includes choral singing, watching comedy shows, poetry, and playing electric guitar. She is also very good friends with [Sumire Uesaka](https://anilist.co/staff/109441/Sumire-Uesaka) (whom she has called "my waifu") and [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi), two fellow seiyuu in the Bang Dream franchise. Sachika's favorite anime are Mobile Suit Gundam 00 and The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, and she admires both [Maaya Sakamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/95090/Maaya-Sakamoto) and [Yukari Tamura](https://anilist.co/staff/95027/Yukari-Tamura).

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia, edited)
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/88151202)

Nobuhiro Nakayama is a producer belonging to [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Formerly [Geneon Universal Entertainment](https://anilist.co/studio/31/), then [Warner Bros.](https://anilist.co/studio/415/)
